text:
look
```using ProgressMeter
using Distributed

p = Progress(10)
channel = RemoteChannel(()->Channel{Bool}(10), 1)

@sync begin
    # this task prints the progress bar
    @async while take!(channel)
        next!(p)
    end

    # this task does the computation
    @async begin
        @distributed (+) for i in 1:10
            sleep(0.1)
            put!(channel, true)
            i^2
        end
        put!(channel, false) # this tells the printing task to finish
    end
end```

elements.text: look

using ProgressMeter
using Distributed

p = Progress(10)
channel = RemoteChannel(()->Channel{Bool}(10), 1)

@sync begin
    # this task prints the progress bar
    @async while take!(channel)
        next!(p)
    end

    # this task does the computation
    @async begin
        @distributed (+) for i in 1:10
            sleep(0.1)
            put!(channel, true)
            i^2
        end
        put!(channel, false) # this tells the printing task to finish
    end
end

text:
```data = open_and_read_histogram("src/input.txt")
xHH, yHH, s = getNormalizeData(data)
print("Fitting v and b using Levenberg Marquard Algorithm,\n this might take 5-10 minutes \n")


function eval()
    result = fit_v_b(xHH, yHH)
    println(result)
  
end


function clearLine()
    print("\e[2K")
    print("\e[1G")
end;

function loader_animation()
    while !done
        print(".")
        sleep(1)
        clearLine()
        print("..")
        sleep(1)
        clearLine()
        print("...")
        sleep(1)
        clearLine()
    end;
end;

#start the animation , and wait untill the function is finished

eval()```

elements.text:
data = open_and_read_histogram("src/input.txt")
xHH, yHH, s = getNormalizeData(data)
print("Fitting v and b using Levenberg Marquard Algorithm,\n this might take 5-10 minutes \n")


function eval()
    result = fit_v_b(xHH, yHH)
    println(result)
  
end


function clearLine()
    print("\e[2K")
    print("\e[1G")
end;

function loader_animation()
    while !done
        print(".")
        sleep(1)
        clearLine()
        print("..")
        sleep(1)
        clearLine()
        print("...")
        sleep(1)
        clearLine()
    end;
end;

#start the animation , and wait untill the function is finished

eval()
